food.description: The amount of food points to restore.
food.markdownDescription: The amount of food points to restore.

saturation.description: The amount of saturation points to restore.
saturation.markdownDescription: The amount of saturation points to restore.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/feed)

Feeds the entity, filling up their hunger bar as if they had eaten a food item with the provided values.

Type ID: `origins:feed`

!!! note

    The actual food saturation level is determined by the `food * saturation * 2` formula.

!!! note

    **This entity action type will only work on players.**
